ls.Description: Listtt information about the FILEs (the current directory by default). Sort entries alphabetically if none of -cftuvSUX nor --sort is speci‐ fied.
ls.Example: ls commands.txt cp.xml cut.xml echo.xml ExampleOnTouchCommand.txt find.xml generator.py grep.xml interface.py Linux_Project_2_Report.pdf ln.xml lspci.xml ls.xml main.py man.xml mv.xml ps.xml __pycache__ sed.xml sort.xml test.xml touch.xml tr.xml verify.py wc.xml whatis.xml which.xml who.xml XmlCreator.py
